name: SOCOM: Fireteam Bravo and Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror
name_original: SOCOM: Fireteam Bravo and Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror
description:
Two of PlayStation Portable's most popular shooter games, SOCOM: Fireteam Bravo and Syphon Filter®: Dark Mirror, are now available in a Dual Pack. Wherever freedom is threatened... the SEALs are there and 860,000 SOCOM fans accepted this next Navy Seal adventure- SOCOM: Fireteam Bravo. In Dark Mirror when a mission is too dangerous for government intelligence, too sensitive for military response... only one man is armed and ready. Gabe Logan. A complete control shooter with better stealth and shooter action enhances this popular PSP® title.

Syphon Filter is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. © 2006 Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc.

SOCOM U.S. Navy SEALs: Fireteam Bravo © 2005 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Zipper Interactive, Inc. © 2005 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. The U.S. Navy provided technical assistance, but does not endorse this product. "SEAL" and the SEAL Trident design are registered trademarks of the Department of the Navy and are used by permission.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item's use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

Multi-player and all online features for this product are no longer available.
